title: Flossie Teacake's Fur Coat
description: Flossie Teacake hates being young and fat and not allowed to do anything. Then she finds that when she tries on her sister's fur coat, she grows up to become a glamourous 18-year-old. Flossie exploits this, discovering the joys (and problems) of boys, pubs, Saturday jobs, discos and more.
author: Hunter Davies
